sorcer.core.loki.group

Interface GroupManagement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Administrable, Outer, Partner, Remote, RemotePartner, Service

    public interface GroupManagement
extends Remote, RemotePartner
    The group management interface lays the interface for database interaction, wrapping dataContext passing to send and retrieve information to the database
    Author:
    Daniel Kerr
